name: VaPurrwave
description:
VaPURRwave is an infinite runner game in which you play as a scientist and find yourself transformed into a cat!

Your lab partner doesn’t know the transformation happened and has alerted security! You must run before you become a test subject yourself! 

This is a student project to create a marketable game prototype in 13 weeks.

Controls

Space to jump to escape the Lab!

Shoot button to shoot! 

The game is in its early prototype, so we would appreciate feedback!

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/BWugiknV2cmz5nBu9
